name: Beat 'em: EDM Gang Clash
description:
Welcome to the sequel of famous action fighting game Beat 'em : EDM Gang Clash!

Beat 'em : EDM Gang Clash! is a fun, excellent retro fighting action game where you can show off your special fighting styles and skills. Besides, the music beats will control your flow. Can you handle that? Let's install to see what really happens. It harder than you think

How to play

- Hold and drag to play! DON'T TAP
- Move to fight the enemies
- Move to avoid the rockets
